roleset.name: to cause to burn
roleset.note: TORCH-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from torch.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Four people torched three U.S. flags on the central steps of the U.S. Capitol in a bid [*] to test a new federal law protecting the American flag from desecration .
example.arg: on the central steps of the U.S. Capitol
in a bid [*] to test a new federal law protecting the American flag from desecration
